cluster_relations.rel_desc: The strangers-luring-children-with-candy motif appears as one type of story being told.
cluster_relations.subject_entity_name: strangers luring children with candy (urban legend)

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: NarrativeRole: example subtype of urban legend story

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Haunted houses are presented as a type or element of the stories being told.
Cursed objects are one of the narrative motifs that constitute these stories.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a recurring narrative motif, setting, or element that appears within and helps constitute the object story or story type.
args.justification: In all three relations, the subject (urban legend motif, location motif, or cursed object motif) functions as a narrative element or motif within the object (stories). This is more precise than a generic part_of and reflects their role in story composition.
Each relation links a narrative motif or element to the stories it helps structure, which fits a class for relations about narrative structure and components of stories.
These relations describe how stories are composed from narrative elements or motifs, which is a compositional (whole–part) dimension.

Each relation links a narrative motif or element to the stories it helps structure, which fits a class for relations about narrative structure and components of stories.
These relations describe how stories are composed from narrative elements or motifs, which is a compositional (whole–part) dimension.
